answers.answer: If the blue spots are coming more frequently, lasting longer, new symptoms are appearing then it is extremely important to have then examined as it could be serious disease of the eye, brain, heart or blood vessels. If nothing is changing, it doesn't last long and there is absolutely no other symptoms then you might do "watchful waiting".JCH MD
